des: "This is a family recipe handed down from my Grandfather.  We have it every Thanksgiving and Christmas.  I am not allowed to come without it."
ins: Toss avocado cubes with lemon juice in a serving bowl; mix avocado with chopped egg and onion. Whisk together the mayonnaise and milk; add to avocado mixture and gently mix. Arrange the remaining eggs sliced atop the salad in rows. Sprinkle top with paprika.
